thread.title: FollowAnalytics Publishes the Definitive Mobile Marketer's
thread.title_full: FollowAnalytics Publishes the Definitive Mobile Marketer's

author: FollowAnalytics
title: FollowAnalytics Publishes the Definitive Mobile Marketer's
text:
SAN FRANCISCO , Sept. 10,   WHAT:  
The Definitive Mobile Marke ter 's Guide to Dreamforce from FollowAnalytics identifies the key sessions, events and networking opportunities that should be on the "to do" for marketers at Dreamforce who are seeking to build their mobile marketing expertise and get the most out of the largest customer success cloud conferences in the world. 



Using the Guide, marketers can quickly navigate through the most relevant mobile marketing activities at Dreamforce from wherever they are. 



The Guide also connects marketers to a CRM Mobile Marketing Insight Series based on a research survey with more than 450 their peers, outlining the benefits and challenges of connecting Salesforce to their mobile marketing initiatives. 



FollowAnalytics will be at the show demonstrating how marketers can easily leverage the power of their Salesforce CRM and Marketing Clouds to create rich 1:1 mobile engagement that gets the right information to the right person at the right time to build deep customer relationships in a mobile omnichannel world. 



Per a recent GigaOm blog post , making apps more contextually relevant can drive consumer engagement. 


WHERE:   
Mobile marketers who are attending Dreamforce should download the Definitive Mobile Marketing Guide to Dreamforce at www.followanalytics.com/dreamforce/ . 


MEDIA: 
FollowAnalytics spokespeople are available for interviews. Executives will also be on-hand at FollowAnalytics' Dreamforce booth, #W118, Moscone West. 


CONTACT:  
Andrea Corry on behalf of FollowAnalytics at (925) 640-5482 or acorry@comunicano.com . 


Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150909/265090LOGO 
 

SOURCE FollowAnalytics
